column4: I have a quick question. I got 3d chess to work, but whenever I click in the window to move a piece, the screen flickers.  Does anyone know how to fix this?????
either 3dchess bug or the infamous "Random Error Distribution" - does it happen with other OpenGL stuff?
I don't know if it happens with other things.
so far I only have this issue with 3d chess
anyway, aptitude tells you if stuff is no longer needed, and often it uninstalls it automatically
it doesn't say what packages are orphaned, it just says what he thinks you no longer need
